name: direct
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: direct
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: going in a straight line towards somewhere or someone without stopping or changing direction

example.eg: a direct route/line
example.egtrans: 直通的路径／线路

example.eg: Is there a direct train to Edinburgh?
example.egtrans: 有到爱丁堡的直达列车吗？

trans_examp.trans_en: without anyone or anything else being involved or between

example.eg: She decided to take direct control of the project.
example.egtrans: 她决定直接管理这个项目。

example.eg: He denied that he had any direct involvement in the deal.
example.egtrans: 他否认自己与这笔交易有任何直接关系。

example.eg: Do you have any direct experience of this kind of work?
example.egtrans: 你有没有这种工作的直接经验？

example.eg: He left as a direct result/consequence of what she said.
example.egtrans: 她的话是他离去的直接原因。

example.eg: There is a direct link/connection between smoking and lung cancer.
example.egtrans: 吸烟与肺癌有直接的联系。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: strong light or heat that has nothing protecting and separating you from it

example.eg: This plant should be kept out of direct sunlight.
example.egtrans: 这种植物应避免阳光直射。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: a relation who is related to you through one of your parents, not through an aunt or uncle, etc.

example.eg: Diana is a direct descendant of Robert Peel.
example.egtrans: 黛安娜是罗伯特‧皮尔的直系后代。

dsense.name: direct
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

example.eg: a direct contrast
example.egtrans: 完全的对比

example.eg: She's very thoughtful - the direct opposite of her sister.
example.egtrans: 她想得很周到——和她姐姐截然相反。

dsense.name: direct
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: Someone who is direct says what they think in a very honest way without worrying about other people's opinions.

example.eg: I like her open and direct manner.
example.egtrans: 我喜欢她坦率直接的态度。

name: direct
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

dsense.name: direct
dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

trans_examp.trans_en: in a straight line towards somewhere without stopping or changing direction

example.eg: Does this bus go direct to the airport?
example.egtrans: 这路公共汽车直接去机场吗？

trans_examp.trans_en: without anyone or anything else being involved or between

example.eg: I intended to go direct to the manager with my complaint.
example.egtrans: 我打算直接向经理投诉。

name: direct
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: direct
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to control or be in charge of an activity, organization, etc.

example.eg: She directs a large charity.
example.egtrans: 她主管一家大型慈善机构。

trans_examp.trans_en: to tell people the direction in which they must drive

example.eg: There was a police officer directing the traffic.
example.egtrans: 有一位警察在指挥交通。

trans_examp.trans_en: to be in charge of a film or play and tell the actors how to play their parts

example.eg: He wanted to give up acting and start directing (his own films).
example.egtrans: 他想放弃表演转而开始导演（自己的电影）。

example.eg: "Jaws" was directed by Steven Spielberg.
example.egtrans: 《大白鲨》是史蒂文•斯皮尔伯格导演的。

dsense.name: direct
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to aim something in a particular direction

example.eg: Was that remark directedat/towards me?
example.egtrans: 这话是对我说的吗？

example.eg: Criticism was directed against/at the manufacturers of the product.
example.egtrans: 批评意见直指该产品的生产厂家。

dsense.name: direct
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to tell someone how to get somewhere

example.eg: Could you direct me to the airport?
example.egtrans: 你能告诉我去机场的路吗？

example.eg: I couldn't find the station, so I asked someone if they could direct me.
example.egtrans: 我找不到车站，只好问路。

dsense.name: direct
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.eg: The judge directed the defendant to remain silent.
example.egtrans: 法官命令被告保持安静。

name: direct
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

trans_examp.trans_en: without having to stop or change direction

example.eg: Does this train go direct to Edinburgh?
example.egtrans: 这是到爱丁堡的直达列车吗？

trans_examp.trans_en: without anything or anyone else being involved or in between

example.eg: Can I dial this number direct or do I have to go through the switchboard?
example.egtrans: 我可以直接拨这个号码还是需要总机接转？
